worsen adolescence even though friends always tried fit popular groups led abandon previous group friends started hanging popular kids never truly considered part group third year high school longer friends watched classmates invited parties one ever invited made feel sad excluded high school situation changed little although everything seemed go wrong first social life improvedbut still felt empty went university study systems engineering take sabbatical year due psychological problems prevented studying made neglect physical health returned resumed studies failed againthis time due lack motivation changed similar degree information technology engineering first semester grades improved little really liked class unlike systems engineering able make good friends however second semester failed againnot incapable insecurities didnt know anymore changed careers againthis time law first liked even graduated better grades hate career feel like kills creative spirit pushed deep depression hurts depression grew started affect sensitive parts personality went choosing wrong career constant attack selfesteem feel like failure idiotsomeone doesnt matter depression made raise expectations success means longer see ordinary family man successful person rather loser trapped systemsomeone whose existence nobody cares started believe way successful achieve mega fame celebrities businessmen thoughts lower selfesteem even make feel im worth nothing dont reach impossible expectations sunday watching oscars felt like total loser know ill never fame people even though know theyre fleshandblood humans like cant help feel inferior damn wish could like themseen loved many life matters othersnot another failure damn depression made hate country environment im desperate takes away live reason havent committed suicide parentstheyve worked hard dont want cause pain know theres greater pain parent losing child pain unbearable passing day hatred world grows stronger sometimes fantasize ending life imagining maybe theres another world could finally successful partner someone important regret rejecting several opportunities someone past physical condition deteriorated know
